text:
Great article!

Pinkerton: Marco Rubio for the Common Good—and Look Who Doesn’t Like It   https://www.breitbart.com/politics/2019/12/28/pinkerton-marco-rubio-for-the-common-good-and-look-who-doesnt-like-it/ via @BreitbartNews

Whenever I meet a little girl, I say: “I’m running for president, because that’s what girls do." And then we make a pinky promise so they’ll remember. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EM6OTDtXsAAJNAB.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EM6OTDqXsAA9ltE.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EM6OTDqXYAAOaTn.jpg

Look at this headline. The people who write these things look down on those who attend these churches & mock them as simpletons & weirdos.

The targets of this condescension notice. That’s why they don’t believe what you report & why they support those who fight back against you. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EM4q6naW4AAiKHJ.jpg
Anybody who thinks you can make the changes this country needs without standing up to the greed and corruption of the 1% is sorely mistaken.

No more tax breaks for billionaires. No more massive subsidies to the fossil fuel industry. Americans are tired of a system that's rigged in favor of the corporate elite and leaves working people behind. Join us live in Plaistow, NH: https://www.pscp.tv/w/cNexnjMyNzU3OTl8MXlOR2FwV01EYmJLaqdvtPaab5uJ_2k3PzBT1IL5mN2oTcCVwx3DlgaoM1fP

Americans want law enforcement to protect and respect them, yet too many people of color continue to be targeted. Ignoring this reality is completely irresponsible. We need stronger police oversight to prevent abuses, and that must include bias training. https://www.cnn.com/2019/12/20/opinions/policing-reform-trump-administration-ifill/index.html

I was grateful to spend time with Rosa yesterday and talk with her about child care workers’ rights. My plans will increase wages for child care workers and make it easier to form a union. https://twitter.com/SEIU/status/1210658179261976576 QT @SEIU It took Rosa and thousands of her fellow CA family child care providers 16 YEARS to finally win the right to a #union. 

Our next president must fight alongside us for #UnionsForAll. That’s why Rosa is bringing @EWarren to #WalkADay in her 👟! http://seiu.me/rsvp-warren-tw http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EM0fMF2UcAAU7SI.jpg

Public education is the best investment in our children's future. My plan would:
🍎Give public school teachers a well-deserved raise.
📖Dramatically increase funding for low-income schools.
✏️Ensure every child can attend a quality preschool. https://corybooker.com/issues/public-education/corys-plan-for-a-great-public-school-in-every-community-and-opportunity-for-every-child/

What motivates some of these people is greed and greed and more greed. It is like a sickness. It is like an addiction. https://twitter.com/business/status/1210648332625940482 QT @business The world's 500 wealthiest people gained $1.2 trillion this year, boosting their collective net worth 25% to $5.9 trillion https://trib.al/wPqcdZZ

I don’t spend my time at fancy fundraisers asking wealthy donors for donations. With 37 days until the #IAcaucus, I’m spending my time with the people.

Today, I’m thanking grassroots donors for chipping into our campaign. Chip in $3 now—and I could call! https://secure.actblue.com/donate/soc-dec19calltime?refcode=soc-FR-ew-tw

"[Bernie] is not running as a politician. He's running as one leading a movement." -Rev. Al Sharpton http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EM40dftW4AIxqac.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1210962153831882754/vid/320x320/aASaYaOxk8pxS8PL.mp4?tag=13

We are not just trying to win an election. We are trying to transform the political conversation in America in terms of what is possible and what is not possible. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1210992554591899651/img/UY6Dm8KfoXcHt_k-.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1210992554591899651/vid/480x270/Tg28fYC8mkygK2Ch.mp4?tag=13

He’s on vacation, but Logan from Maine still picked up the phone when I called to thank him for being a donor! Logan chipped in $3—and that $3 makes a difference as we work to close our fundraising gap before the FEC deadline.

Will you chip in $3, too? http://ewar.ren/Call-Time http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1211101813006622720/img/oqrjfwiX_2cucT6Z.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1211101813006622720/vid/320x320/bWPbBNDrXF8ZfReB.mp4?tag=13

Thus says the LORD: In Ramah is heard the sound of sobbing,
bitter weeping! Rachel mourns for her children,she refuses to be consoledfor her children—they are no more!

Jeremiah 31:15

It may be scary or difficult to speak out and share your struggles. But the more we talk about it, the more we are willing to stand together against powerful special interests, that is when real change takes place.

Get them now for 15% off with discount code LASTCHANCE15.

https://store.pelosiforcongress.org/collections/sale

I spend my time thanking grassroots donors, because grassroots donors make growing our campaign possible—and I’ll be calling folks all weekend!
https://www.nytimes.com/2019/12/27/us/politics/elizabeth-warren-2020-phonecalls.html

This is wrong. We know that purging voter registrations disproportionately affects people of color. This is voter suppression in plain sight. We have to fight this with everything we’ve got. https://thehill.com/homenews/state-watch/476098-us-judge-denies-bid-to-restore-98000-purged-georgia-voters

Ultimately, we face a choice: do we tolerate the insatiable greed of the billionaire class, whose control over our political system lets them take food out of the mouths of hungry school kids? 

Or do we build an equitable society that ends poverty, hunger and homelessness? https://twitter.com/GuardianUS/status/1209491013221388288 QT @GuardianUS Trump's holiday menu: handouts for billionaires, hunger for the poor | Bernie Sanders and Rashida Tlaib https://www.theguardian.com/commentisfree/2019/dec/24/food-stamps-billionaires-nutrition-assistance-bernie-sanders-rashida-tlaib?utm_term=Autofeed&CMP=edit_2221&utm_medium=Social&utm_source=Twitter#Echobox=1577200103

Senate Republicans want you to think the House isn’t doing anything. Apparently they’ve missed the stack of House-passed legislation piling up on Leader McConnell’s desk. #ForThePeople https://www.vox.com/2019/11/29/20977735/how-many-bills-passed-house-democrats-trump
We need to take steps to fix our long-term care system so that families don’t go broke taking care of their loved ones. I have a plan to address this: https://corybooker.com/care
Social mobility is one of the things that makes America great, a land of dreamers. Every kid should have a fair shot at that opportunity.

On Jan. 1, millions of Americans' health insurance deductibles will reset.

The way our health care system works today is that if you are unlucky enough to get hurt or sick in two weeks instead of today, you might not be able to afford care you need.

Is that not totally absurd?

Until 1967, you could bank at your local post office in the U.S. At one point our postal banks serviced 4 million customers.

We must guarantee basic financial services to Americans by allowing every post office to offer basic banking services again. https://inthesetimes.com/article/22140/postal-service-usps-privatization-climate-change-banking

Moniqua, a small business owner in Georgia, chipped in $20 to our campaign—so I just gave her a call to say thanks! This is how I like to spend call time: On the phone with grassroots donors who make it happen.
 
Chip in $3 now and I could call you soon: http://ewar.ren/Call-Time http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1211091725843861504/img/_AADftpHWbHn7Q9F.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1211091725843861504/vid/320x320/9BFrqVgFlvCBRvAd.mp4?tag=13

RT @anna_bahr You know that “holiday lull”? Not really a thing when you’re organizing to elect @BernieSanders for president. It’s a Saturday at 10am and there’s a line out the door to get in for canvassing training http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EM5I7J7U0AUgl4z.jpg

"Who is Bernie Sanders? He's kind of the opposite of Donald Trump." http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1210991261357871104/img/iedU8hmCIaEyNrcI.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1210991261357871104/vid/480x270/7-YtWSbsqTPaTEb0.mp4?tag=13

We're building the unprecedented grassroots power that we need to not only defeat Donald Trump, but to take back our democracy from the corporate elite. Join us live in New Hampshire: https://www.pscp.tv/w/cNfYzzMyNzU3OTl8MXZPeHdhRURnTlZHQhWay5zgf2aQGj_zbZeJPg6EqN3hTn6fyhG7U5BG64rj

Medicare for All means freedom to see a doctor without fear of getting a huge bill. It means an end to "medical debt." It means no co-pays, premiums or deductibles. Join our town hall in Dover: https://www.pscp.tv/w/cNeFqDMyNzU3OTl8MURYeHlwUm5CcVBKTYB3i_B25mdaC-pdXS6czi7S8IMSlrN6cOubJSZA2D3i

Climate change is an existential threat—and we're running out of time.

In 2020, we need to elect a president who will fight this crisis. I'll fight to root out the corruption in Washington, pass a #GreenNewDeal, and create millions of green jobs. https://elizabethwarren.com/plans/climate-change?refcode=soc-FR-ew-tw

Storytellers are vital to our movement. @MarkRuffalo is lifting up the story of the ordinary heroes who stood up to the deadly lies and greed of DuPont.

Corporations are used to buying off our political system. When millions of people come together, we are going to change that. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EM4eqaYWsAAROab.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1210937291608403971/vid/320x320/16dHRDERrAl2i12u.mp4?tag=13

While anti-Trump derangement shapes what’s on cable news & in newspaper columns @potus & GOP led Senate is reshaping our judiciary with young & intelligent constitutionalist judges. 

https://www.wsj.com/articles/revitalizing-the-federal-courts-11577486276?emailToken=fcea6b0687125db456bc877a873c14278JsQihikKnFBEx9+lId5AvTm1v0VWJHmFQOfLAMjOLCfBGUnNkMY5tmoJB2uDaDa3hCj492T6xEu9EWm31yuow%3D%3D&reflink=article_copyURL_share

I want to tell a story about why, http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EM5DOpVXsAI5QTn.jpg
Our mission is not just passing legislation. It is making sure the American people are united in standing up for racial justice, for environmental justice, for economic justice.

Far too many Native women are dying and disappearing, their cases going unreported, unsolved, or untouched by law enforcement. We must speak out for them—and be there for those who return home.
https://www.nytimes.com/2019/12/25/us/native-women-girls-missing.html

Because she has a plan to get America working for working people. Because when your entire young life you are told by entertainers,schools, media & the culture that America is a bigoted nation guilty of all sorts of evil at home & abroad, it isn’t hard to wind up approving of whatever is the opposite of your country. https://twitter.com/marketwatch/status/1210785130484158466 QT @MarketWatch 36% of millennials polled say that they approve of communism, which is up significantly from 28% in 2018. https://trib.al/HKFDkVE
